data.event: By 1791 it was being hailed as "the first manufacturing town in the world".
From the summer of 1940 to the spring of 1943, Birmingham was bombed heavily by the German Luftwaffe in what is known as the Birmingham Blitz.

event.title: led to extensive demolition and redevelopment in subsequent decades

data.event: The damage done to the city's infrastructure, in addition to a deliberate policy of demolition and new building by planners, led to extensive demolition and redevelopment in subsequent decades.
